doc.field: Series XXIII: Pride and Progress / The Right Stuff
Series XXIII: Pride and Progress / The Right Stuff
[1]--Pride and Progress, Episode No. 39 [2]--The Right Stuff [Air Date: 9/26/1986]
[1]--Pride and Progress, Episode No. 39 [2]--The Right Stuff [Air Date: 9/26/1986]

Pride and ProgressNews-highlights:1. Plans for a 1987 national gay demonstration in Washington, DC2. California, gathering support in Hollywood against the LaRouche AIDS quarantine referendum3. Former President Jimmy Carter tells Jerry Falwell to "go to hell"4. Andy Humm on President Reagan's silence regarding AIDS health crisisCOMMERCIAL: "New York Native" with Quentin Crisp5. Radio for Europe announcer names New York City mayor Ed Koch and San Francisco mayor Diane Feinstein as homosexuals6. Pentagon announces expansion of HIV antibody testing program to include students enrolled in ROTC programs7. CDC research program on AIDS delayed due to in-fighting amongst researchers8. Failure of experimental vaccine to protect against AIDS-like infection in simiansCOMMERCIAL: "First Hand" gay magazine9. Sports ReportCOMMERCIAL: Vivian Shapiro for the Human Rights Campaign Fund10. Closing credits
The Right Stuff:1. This Week in Gay History with Jeff BixbyCOMMERCIAL: "Manscape" gay magazine2. Clips of Cincinnati's drag performer, Hurricane SommersCOMMERCIAL: Gay Cable Network fundraiser3.Excerpt from Phil Donahue's "Human Animal" on gays in America and coming out4. Interview with J. D. Slater, gay porn director and actorCOMMERCIAL: "Woman Talk" theater pieceCOMMERCIAL: Body Mate exercise equipment5. Continuation of interview with director Derek Jarman6. Closing credits
[1]--Pride and Progress, Episode No. 39 [2]--The Right Stuff [Air Date: 9/26/1986]: September 1986
